Course Description: THIS COURSE IS AN INTRODUCTION TO COMPUTERIZED INTEGRATED ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES FOUND IN MICROCOMPUTER OFFICE ENVIRONMENTS.  IT INCLUDES THE APPLICATION OF SOFTWARE DESIGNED FOR GENERAL LEDGER ACCOUNTS PAYABLE, ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE, FINANCIAL STATEMENT ANALYSIS, PURCHASE ORDER AND SALES PROCESSING, VOUCHER SYSTEMS, INVENTORY, FIXED ASSETS, PAYROLL, AND DEPARTMENTAL ACCOUNTING.
Textbook(s): OWEN.  USING QUICKBOOKS PRO FOR ACCOUNTING 2011 (INCLUDES CD-ROM).  PUBLISHER:  SOUTH-WESTERN CENGAGE LEARNING.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
